headline.main: LINKS HITLER PRIZE TO 'HIGH AUTHORITY'; Dr. Church Says $1,000,000 Offer Was Made Through Him After Letter From Europe NAZI PLANS ARE REVEALED Message From Statesman Told in Advance of Slaughter on Western Front, He Says

lead_paragraph: PITTSBURGH, June 1--Dr. Samuel Harden Church released today the following statement concerning the offer of $1,000,000 reward made on May 1 for the arrest and trial of Adolf Hitler before an international high court of justice for the crime of making war:
